title: As Google TV slowly replaces Android TV, Philips may make the switch in 2023
content:
Google TV launched in 2020 with the goal of replacing the Android TV experience entirely within a couple of years. As the clock ticks away, more brands are getting on board with the Google TV experience, including long-time partner Philips.

more…

The post As Google TV slowly replaces Android TV, Philips may make the switch in 2023 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Starting in 2023, it seems Philips will make the switch over from Android TV to Google TV on newer models, after resisting for 2 years.
